metadata.title: CVE-2021-3114 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In Go before 1.14.14 and 1.15.x before 1.15.7, crypto/elliptic/p224.go cangenerate incorrect outputs, related to an underflow of the lowest limbduring the final complete reduction in the P-224 field.

criterions.comment: golang-1.6 package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
golang-1.10 package in xenial is affected and needs fixing.
golang-1.13 package in xenial is affected and needs fixing.
